lac.algorithms.cba

Class CBA

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.algorithms.Algorithm
      • lac.algorithms.cba.CBA

  • public class CBA
extends Algorithm
    Main class for the algorithm CBA. Please refer to the original publication for more information on this algorithm. B. Liu, W. Hsu, and Y. Ma, “Integrating classification and association rule mining,” in 4th International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining(KDD98),1998, pp. 80–86
